comments.author: Brad B.

comments.text:
+Brad B. You're right. I was talking about life expectancy as opposed to 
lifespan. I was trying to make the point that the wacky woman in the video 
was wrong in blaming world problems on a lack of belief in god. And that 
humans have benefited from scientific advances and an understanding of this 
planet based on scientific evidence and not a superstitious belief system.
comments.author: kristabella222

comments.text:
+kristabella222 you have somehow managed to get the maximum human life span 
confused with life expectancy. Human lifespans are longer today than in the 
immediate past but what about 200 years ago? 500 years ago? 2000? You start 
making up pseudo sciences to fill in the gaps. Of course people are living 
longer now and there is less infant mortality. But all of what you said is 
not something I would say. You basically just made up a bunch of word 
vomit. All I said was that there are more people today. There is a larger 
population of humans on the planet. There is actually a massive population 
compared to just recent past. Take for example that Minnesota had a census 
of less than 7000 people in 1850. Now that number has swelled to over 5 
million. There is just more people and much more things you need to account 
for while dating age from the past as to compared to now. It is not simple.
comments.author: Brad B.

comments.text:
Are you saying the life expectancy was just as high before modern medicine? 
And that people routinely lived to be 100 years old back when there 
was very limited scientific knowledge? That doesn't make any sense.
comments.author: kristabella222

comments.text: +kristabella222 there are more people today.
comments.author: Brad B.

comments.text:
I think there are definitely more people today that live to be 100 than in 
the past before we had the scientific knowledge we have now. Even counting 
the fact that high child mortality rates brought down life expectancy, if 
you were lucky enough to live to age 20 you were still more likely to die 
of infection, childbirth ( if you were a woman of course) tuberculosis, 
appendicitis, even a broken leg could kill you. All that would make the 
life expectancy pretty grim and probably not much over 31 before we had 
some knowledge of medical science.
comments.author: kristabella222

comments.text:
People didn't die at 31. That is a misguided input. The birth rates and 
less deaths during birth to about 10 made people seem to live longer. 
However I have no doubt in my mind that there were people 100 years old in 
year 0.

comments.text:
I don't agree that Christianity led to the Holocaust. Maybe it was a factor 
in promoting general antisemitism, put the thing that was a lot more 
responsible for the Holocaust was the eugenics movement...Hitler and the 
Nazis weren't Christians...they thought Christianity promoted weakness 
(i.e., the meek shall inherit the earth; turn the other cheek)...all of 
this stuff is antithetical to the Social Darwinist Nazi agenda. I'm not 
anti-science at all by the way...I don't want anyone to misinterpret this 
post. I accept evolution. But I think people blaming the Holocaust on 
Christians is almost as silly as Christians blaming Darwin for the 
Holocaust. Nazism is very complicated, which is why it has both elements of 
the left and of the right. It's a weird freak thing.﻿

comments.author: West Is Best

comments.text:
+Peter Melillo
While it is certainly silly to blame Darwin for the Holocaust, since the 
Nazis actually banned Darwin's entire body of work, and also Ernst 
Haeckel's, there is absolutely a smoking gun among the biggest names in 
christianity. Check out this excerpt from Martin Luther's book "on the jews 
and their lies":

"What then shall we Christians do with this damned, rejected race of Jews? 
Since they live among us, we dare not tolerate their conduct, now that we 
are aware of their lying and reviling and blaspheming. If we do, we become 
sharers in their lies, cursing and blasphemy. Thus we cannot extinguish the 
unquenchable fire of divine wrath, of which the prophets speak, nor can we 
convert the Jews. With prayer and the fear of God we must pratice a sharp 
mercy to see whether we might save at least a few from the glowing flames. 
We dare not avenge ourselves. Vengenance a thousand times worse than we 
could wish them already has them by the throat. I shall give you my sincere 
advice: 

First to set fire to their synagogues or schools and to bury and cover with 
dirt whatever will not burn, so that no man will ever again see a stone or 
cinder of them. This is to be done in honor of our Lord and of Christendom, 
so that God might see that we are Christians, and do not condone or 
knowingly tolerate such public lying, cursing, and blaspheming of his Son 
and of his Christians. For whatever we tolerated in the past 
unknowingly—and I myself was unaware of it—will be pardoned by God. But if 
we, now that we are informed, were to protect and shield such a house for 
the Jews, existing right before our very nose, in which they lie about, 
blaspheme, curse, vilify, and defame Christ and us (as was heard above), it 
would be the same as if we were doing all this and even worse ourselves, as 
we very well know. 

Second, I advise that their houses also be razed and destroyed. For they 
pursue in them the same aims as in their synagogues. Instead they might be 
lodged under a roof or in a barn, like the gypsies. This will bring home to 
them that they are not masters in our country, as they boast, but that they 
are living in exile and in captivity, as they incessantly wail and lament 
about us before God.

Third, I advise that all their prayer books and Talmudic writings, in which 
such idolatry, lies, cursing and blasphemy are taught, be taken from them. 
. . .

Fourth, I advise that their rabbis be forbidden to teach henceforth on pain 
of loss of life and limb. For they have justly forfeited the right to such 
an office by holding the poor Jews captive with the saying of Moses 
(Deuternomy 17 [:10 ff.]) in which he commands them to obey their teachers 
on penalty of death, although Moses clearly adds: "what they teach you in 
accord with the Law of the Lord." Those villains ignore that. They wantonly 
employ the poor people's obedience contrary to the law of the Lord and 
infuse them with this poison, cursing, and blasphemy. In the same way the 
pope also held us captive with the declaration in Matthew 16 {:18], "You 
are Peter," etc, inducing us to believe all the lies and deceptions that 
issued from his devilish mind. He did not teach in accord with the Word of 
God, and therefore he forfeited the righ to teach. 

Fifth, I advise that safe-conduct on the highways be abolished completely 
for the Jews. For they have no business in the countryside, since they are 
not lords, officials, tradesmen, or the like. Let they stay at home. . . If 
you princes and nobles do not close the road legally to such exploiters, 
then some troop ought to ride against them, for they will learn from this 
pamphlet what the Jews are and how to handle them and that they ought not 
to be protected. You ought not, you cannot protect them, unless in the eyes 
of God you want to share all their abomination. 

Sixth, I advise that usury be prohibited to them, and that all cash and 
treasure of silver and gold be taken from them and put aside for 
safekeeping. The reason for such a measure is that, as said above, they 
have no other means of earning a livelihood than usury, and by it they have 
stolen and robbed from us all they possess. Such money should now be used 
in no other way than the following: Whenever a Jew is sincerely converted, 
he should be handed one hundred, two hundred, or three hundred florins, as 
personal circumstances may suggest. With this he could set himself up in 
some occupation for the support of his poor wife and children, and the 
maintenance of the old or feeble. For such evil gains are cursed if they 
are not put to use with God's blessing in a good and worthy cause. 

Seventh, I commend putting a flail, an ax, a hoe, a spade, a distaff, or a 
spindle into the hands of young, strong Jews and Jewesses and letting them 
earn their bread in the sweat of their brow, as was imposed on the children 
of Adam (Gen 3[:19]). For it is not fitting that they should let us 
accursed Goyim toil in the sweat of our faces while they, the holy people, 
idle away their time behind the stove, feasting and farting, and on top of 
all, boasting blasphemously of their lordship over the Christians by means 
of our sweat. No, one should toss out these lazy rogues by the seat of 
their pants."

If that's not point for point the very fucking blueprint for the Nazi's 
"Endlösung", I don't know what is...
comments.author: leungchaan

comments.text:
I am German and a historian. Hitler was in his world view not a christian 
and didnt believe in god, his belief was called by himself "Forseeing" 
(dont know how to translate it) ("Vorsehung"), that means he believed that 
there was a goal the world was heading and he had to establish a world were 
the "aryan race" would rule over humanity as it "is preset". The woman is 
in that case is right because the church was the first one who said "all 
life is equal", while the nazis said "there is life worthier than the 
other", but she doesnt explain it. Probably a marketing guy told her to 
said that and she didnt get what that means. 

By the way nazism is practically a right wing agenda (if you would put it 
in a chart it is by ~85% right wing with only a few left wing goals like 
some basic social systems). Hitler often opposed "capitalism" in his 
speeches but only because he wanted to win socialists for his party which 
worked. Nazism cant be seen in any way as a major left wing agenda because 
it opposes almost everything which is determined to the left wing of the 
pol. spectrum.

It is my understanding that the SS had a requirement to be christian, and 
that it had banned atheism.  SS belt buckles say "god with us"  Hitler said 
in a speech "The National Government will preserve and defend those basic 
principles on which our nation has been built up. It regards Christianity 
as the foundation of our national morality and the family as the basis of 
national life." 

Makes it all a bit peculiar does't it? 

"The Government of the Reich regards Christianity as the unshakable 
foundation of the morals and moral code of the nation." "The rights of the 
churches will not be diminished."
--from The Speeches of Adolph Hitler, 1922-1939, Vol. 1, pg. 369-372 
(London, Oxford University Press, 1942 - edition of 1969.
comments.author: whiskeybeerbeer

comments.text:
+whiskeybeerbeer I don't for a second deny that Germany was predominantly 
Christian. But who were the people running the camps? The SS. The SS squads 
that followed the Wehrmacht rounded up peoples and murdered them...not the 
Wehrmacht...by and large. And Christianity was forbidden for members of the 
SS. Not the Waffen SS, but the einsatzgruppen, the death squads. And, no. 
Hitler was hardly a Christian. He said that he wished Islam had conquered 
Europe instead of the weak religion of Christianity.
comments.author: West Is Best

comments.author: whiskeybeerbeer

comments.text:
To be fair...Christian anti-Semitism paved the way for the Holocaust. The 
Holocaust would not have targeted Jews had there not been rampant religious 
anti-Semitism among Europeans. If you look at India...which had a sizable 
Jewish minority until recent times...the Jews were not persecuted. Why? 
Well...because Hinduism did not accuse them of deicide or killing their 
prophets as Christianity and Islam did. However...the SS and those who 
actually ran the camps were not Christians. They were neo Pagans. They 
bastardized Asatru with racialism. And while Hitler and Himmler both were 
raised Catholics, and even Hitler said he was Christian...neither went to 
church. The argument that the Nazis were Christians is one that people who 
have not studied national socialism in depth make all the time, and it is 
wrong.
comments.author: West Is Best

comments.text:
ATHEISM IS DETRIMENTAL TO SOCIETY
Try hard, if you will, to perceive the worth of atheism and if you make a 
proper assessment of its worth to any portion of mankind, it will be 
revealed to you that atheism is a demonic ideology or religion that is 
utterly worthless, to say the least. It darkens the minds of its subjects 
and bring curses upon every facet of human life.
The two basic responsibilities every person of mankind have are to love God 
more than all else and to love mankind. Atheism accomplishes neither one of 
these responsibilities. It blasphemes against God and brings harm and death 
upon mankind.
Atheists are not fit to be parents; they are not fit to be employed in any 
portion of any society; they are not fit to be any kind of leaders in any 
society, nor are they fit to serve in any area of public trust. Atheism 
makes every person who embraces it unfit for any good work.
Atheists are not even fit to live. They have forfeited the right to life by 
virtue of being unfit for any good thing.
The decline or absence of morals in any society can be traced to atheism or 
the like. All the problems in every facet of society the world over can be 
traced to atheism, or denial
of God and disobedience to him. The rapid increase in crime the world over 
can be traced to the same. Atheism has nothing good to offer any society.
Atheism is so heinous and does so much harm that there is desperate need 
for legislation against it. It is not an ideology, philosophy or demonic 
religion which should be allowed to exist and flourish in any society. 
Every atheist should be regarded as high criminals by all governments who 
have no right to live on the earth.﻿
